FlowDefinition.description: Created as a part of 2023 R1 enhancements (US-717). This flow triggers when a Grant Approval Case is updated to "Closed - Approved/Resolved". It then triggers the corresponding external email alert to ERPSupport and pushes the Grant related field values from the Case to the Opportunity itself.
FlowDefinition.masterLabel: Grant Approval Case Updated --> Update Related Opportunity
